meanings.definition: A style of decorative painting on wood or metal, typically featuring floral motifs and scrollwork.
meanings.sent1: She learned rosemaling from her grandmother and now decorates all her furniture with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The artist's rosemaling on the antique chest brought out the beauty of the wood.
meanings.sent3: During the rosemaling class, the students accidentally painted a flower upside down, creating a whimsical design.
meanings.sent4: Her rosemaling was like a garden blooming on the wooden tray, adding life to the plain surface.
meanings.sent5: The intricate rosemaling on the metal vase made it look like a priceless artifact.

meanings.definition: The act of painting in the rosemaling style.
meanings.sent1: Watching her mother do rosemaling inspired her to pick up a paintbrush and try it herself.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours perfecting her rosemaling, creating delicate patterns on every piece she painted.
meanings.sent3: The rosemaling competition at the fair turned into a colorful frenzy of brushstrokes and creativity.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to rosemaling turned his workshop into a vibrant studio of swirling colors.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the scent of fresh paint as she worked on her latest rosemaling project.
